entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near mainland valleys and inlets overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near mainland valleys and inlets in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:50 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
